data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 2, Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart's Roberto Massimo breaks free at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 2, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Freiburg at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Stuttgart.
Goal! Freiburg have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Nils Petersen.
In the minute 8, Great play from Roland Sallai to set up the goal.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Stuttgart close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Freiburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, In Stuttgart, Silas Wamangituka of Stuttgart is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Stuttgart pushes forward through Wataru Endo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 17, Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Stuttgart's half?
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Can Stuttgart capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 20, Stuttgart's Daniel Didavi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Freiburg defender.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 22, Important block from the Freiburg defence as Silas Wamangituka fires in a strike for Stuttgart.
Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Freiburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 25, Daniel Didavi (Stuttgart) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Roland Sallai extends Freiburg's lead to 0-2.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 29, Freiburg advance rapidly upfield but Benjamin Cortus blows for offside.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Freiburg.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart just outside Freiburg's area.
In the minute 34, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Holer for Freiburg has been booked by Benjamin Cortus and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
Stuttgart are coming forward and Orel Mangala gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 41, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Stuttgart in Stuttgart.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick Freiburg.
Silas Wamangituka is booked for the home team.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Freiburg needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Mercedes Benz Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roberto Massimo of Stuttgart smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Vincenzo Grifo extends Freiburg's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 48, Lucas Holer instrumental with a fine assist.
Freiburg's Nils Petersen has run offside.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 50, Benjamin Cortus signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In Stuttgart Stuttgart's Gonzalo Castro is caught offside.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 56, Benjamin Cortus awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 57, Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Stuttgart drives forward and Mateo Klimowicz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Philipp Klement is replacing Gonzalo Castro for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
Freiburg push forward at Mercedes Benz Arena and Lucas Holer gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Stuttgart defence.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 64, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart make their second substitution with Sasa Kalajdzic replacing Marcin Kaminski.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart's Sasa Kalajdzic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 68, In Stuttgart a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Stuttgart, Freiburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 70, Important block from the Stuttgart defence as Woo-yeong Jeong fires in a strike for Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-3 through a strike by Sasa Kalajdzic. .
Daniel Didavi with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Marc Kempf's header is off-target for Stuttgart.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Mercedes Benz Arena.
